Image &  Image

Update

Parameters:
Id Texture's ID
Image Update image
Returns:
false if something fails
Remarks:
If you need to update the texture with another way of data, get the Ogre::TexturePtr and modify it directly. Normal image will be Image::Type::TYPE_RGB [0,255] range
